__e: And brainwashed me into believing that my father was evil.
Only thing I don't get is how is brainwashing some guy I really like in your plan to keep me safe?
Catherine, he brainwashed me, he took away my life, my memories, then he made me kill for him, and when he was done with me, he tried to kill me, so I'm not giving him another chance.
I think it might be a better idea to park the truck over at the car wash, and sort of ease into things, right?
I mean, there is no car wash in the world that could do this kind of business.
Fortunately, there is, just five minutes away from the car wash, there is the top child care center in the city.
